title: Russia, China and S.Korea vie for Bulgarian project
titleEn: Russia, China and S.Korea vie for Bulgarian project
description: State run energy companies from Russia, China and South Korea are among seven groups interested in becoming strategic investors in Bulgaria's Belene nuclear power project, the Balkan nation's energy minister said on Tuesday.
summarization: Neighboring North Macedonia has also expressed an interest in a minority stake and long-term contracts to buy electricity from the 2,000-megawatt project on the river Danube, estimated to cost 10 billion euros ($11 billion, Temenuzhka Petkova said. One Bulgarian energy firm is eyeing a minority stake and a long-term electricity purchase contract.

title: 109th Birth Anniversary of Mother Teresa who taught world importance of giving
titleEn: 109th Birth Anniversary of Mother Teresa who taught world importance of giving
description: Mother Teresa, who devoted her life to help the poorest of the poor, the destitutes and orphans, is a symbol of humanity. Also known as Saint Teresa of Calcutta (now Kolkata, Mother received Nobel Peace Prize for her charity work. She was born in Skopje, Macedonia, on August 26, 1910, and today is her 109th birth anni
summarization: Also known as Saint Teresa of Calcutta (now Kolkata, Mother received Nobel Peace Prize for her charity work. She was a teacher at the Loreto convent school in Entally, Kolkata.

title: 109th Birth Anniversary of Mother Teresa who taught world importance of giving

title: Mother Teresa remembered on her 22nd death anniversary
titleEn: Mother Teresa remembered on her 22nd death anniversary
description: Mother Teresa's death anniversary is observed as International Day of Charity. Mother Teresa, known for her undying dedication towards the downtrodden people and who devoted her life to work for the poorest of the poor in the slums, passed away on 5 September, 1997, at the age of 87.
summarization: 5 September is selected as the date to celebrate the International Day of Charity because this was the date of passing away of Mother Teresa. St Teresa of Calcutta was born on August 26, 1910 at Skopje in Macedonia.

title: Mother Teresa remembered on her 22nd death anniversary
titleEn: Mother Teresa remembered on her 22nd death anniversary
description: Mother Teresa's death anniversary is observed as International Day of Charity. Mother Teresa, known for her undying dedication towards the downtrodden people and who devoted her life to work for the poorest of the poor in the slums, passed away on 5 September, 1997, at the age of 87.
summarization: 5 September is selected as the date to celebrate the International Day of Charity because this was the date of passing away of Mother Teresa. Special masses and prayers were held today to pay tribute to Mother Teresa, also kniwn as Saint Teresa of Calcutta, on her 22th death anniversary.

title: 47 ਦਿਨ ਪਹਿਲਾਂ ਸ਼ੁਰੂ ਹੋਇਆ ਚੰਦਰਯਾਨ-2 ਦਾ ਸਫਰ

title: Gerard Piqué als Unternehmer: Nebenberuf Fußballstar
titleEn: Gerard Piqué as entrepreneur: part-time football star
description: Er spielt beim FC Barcelona, hat angeblich einen IQ von 170 und ist mit einem Popstar verheiratet. Doch Gerard Piqué hat noch mehr vor: Er will einen Drittligisten in die Champions-League führen und die Tenniswelt revolutionieren.
summarization: Auch die halbe Tenniswelt hat er gegen sich aufgebracht, indem er mit seiner Holding Kosmos den Davis Cup auf den Kopf stellte. Dass diese auch als Barças Hauptsponsor auftritt, ist eine Folge von Piqués Freundschaft mit Mikitani.

title: Gerard Piqué als Unternehmer: Nebenberuf Fußballstar
description: Er spielt beim FC Barcelona, hat angeblich einen IQ von 170 und ist mit einem Popstar verheiratet. Doch Gerard Piqué hat noch mehr vor: Er will einen Drittligisten in die Champions-League führen und die Tenniswelt revolutionieren.

title: Gerard Piqué als Unternehmer: Nebenberuf Fußballstar
description: Er spielt beim FC Barcelona, hat angeblich einen IQ von 170 und ist mit einem Popstar verheiratet. Doch Gerard Piqué hat noch mehr vor: Er will einen Drittligisten in die Champions-League führen und die Tenniswelt revolutionieren.
summarization: Dem auf der anderen Seite gerade ein katalanischer Rapper ein Lied widmete, weil er "die Jugend repräsentiert: immer mit offenem Visier, auch wenn nicht alle wie er denken". Schon laufen in Barcelona informelle Wetten, bei welchem Champions-League-Verein er als erstes Präsident wird: Andorra oder Barça.

title: Spanienrundfahrt Vuelta a España: Angriff auf die Tour de France
titleEn: Tour of Spain Vuelta a España: Attack on the Tour de France
description: Die Vuelta a España stand lange im Schatten vom Giro d'Italia und der Tour de France. Doch sie hat sich mit neuen, harten Strecken attraktiver gemacht - zum Leidwesen der Sprinter.
summarization: Doch das war nicht immer so, denn die Spanienrundfahrt brauchte Jahrzehnte, um ihren heutigen Platz neben der Tour de France und dem Giro d'Italia zu finden. Attacke in Andorra Ein weiteres Beispiel für die typische Vuelta-Streckenplanung zeigt die neunte Etappe am Sonntag in Andorra: Sie ist zwar lediglich 94,4 Kilometer lang, hat es mit fünf Bergwertungen aber in sich, darunter der Coll de la Gallina, ein Berg der schwersten Kategorie, und der Weg hoch auf über 2000 Meter nach Els Cortals d'Encamp.

title: EM-Qualifikation: Peinlich: Andorra-Hymne abgespielt statt albanischer
titleEn: EM qualification: Embarrassing: Andorra anthem played instead of Albanian
description: Das ging mal richtig daneben: Das Fußball-EM-Qualifikationsspiel zwischen Frankreich und Albanien am Samstag in Paris ist wegen einer peinlichen Verwechslung fast zehn Minuten später angepfiffen worden.
summarization: Die falsche Hymne wurde bis zum Schluss durchgespielt. Nachdem der Fehler bemerkt wurde, kam dann die richtige hinterher.

title: Andorra-Hymne abgespielt statt albanischer
summarization: Denn statt der albanischen Hymne erklang im Stade de France die Hymne von Andorra. Nachdem der Fehler bemerkt wurde, kam dann die richtige hinterher.

title: Stadion spielt Hymne von Andorra anstatt Albanien bei EM-Quali in Frankreich
titleEn: Stadium plays hymn of Andorra rather than Albania at European Championship Qualifiers in France
description: Das Fußball-EM-Qualifikationsspiel zwischen Frankreich und Albanien am Samstag in Paris/St. Denis ist wegen einer peinlichen Verwechslung fast zehn Minuten später angepfiffen worden. Denn statt der albanischen Hymne erklang im Stade de France die Hymne von Andorra.
summarization: Denn statt der albanischen Hymne erklang im Stade de France die Hymne von Andorra. Nachdem der Fehler bemerkt worden war, folgte die richtige.

title: ÖFB-U21 peilt gegen Albanien zweiten Sieg in EM-Quali an
titleEn: ÖFB-U21 is aiming for Albania second victory in European Championship qualifier
description: Österreichs Fußball-U21-Nationalteam hat im zweiten Spiel der EM-Qualifikation den zweiten Sieg im Visier. Nach dem 3:1 in Andorra bekommt es die Auswahl von Coach Werner Gregoritsch am Montag (16.00 Uhr/live ORF Sport + in Durres mit Albanien zu tun.
summarization: Österreichs Fußball-U21-Nationalteam hat im zweiten Spiel der EM-Qualifikation den zweiten Sieg im Visier. "Wir sind trotz der langen und beschwerlichen Anreise gut gerüstet", betonte Gregoritsch.

title: Albanien: EM-Qualifikation heute im Livestream & Free-TV
titleEn: Albania: European Championship qualifier today in Livestream & Free-TV
description: Österreichs U21 -Nationalteam hat im zweiten Spiel der EM-Qualifikation den zweiten Sieg im Visier. Nach dem 3:1 in Andorra bekommt es die Auswahl von Coach Werner Gregoritsch am Montag in Durres mit Albanien zu tun. SPOX verrät, wo das Spiel wann zu sehen ist.
summarization: Österreichs U21-Nationalteam hat im zweiten Spiel der EM-Qualifikation den zweiten Sieg im Visier. Österreichs Auswärts-Duell mit Albanien ist im Free-TV zu sehen.

title: Perfekter Start in EM-Qualifikation
titleEn: Perfect start in European Championship qualification
description: Die österreichische U21-Nationalmannschaft hat in der Qualifikation für die EURO 2021 einen perfekten Start hingelegt. Nach dem Auftakterfolg in Andorra gewann die Mannschaft von Trainer Werner Gregoritsch auch in Albanien klar mit 4:0 (2:0.
summarization: Nach dem Auftakterfolg in Andorra gewann die Mannschaft von Trainer Werner Gregoritsch auch in Albanien klar mit 4:0 (2:0. Marko Raguz agierte nach schöner Vorlage von Christoph Baumgartner vor dem gegnerischen Tor abgebrüht, für den LASK-Stürmer war es sein erstes Tor im U21-Team.

title: Badestellen-Bewachung in Brüel und Umgebung: Ferienende: Die ersten Retter packen ein
titleEn: Bathing place guard in Brüel and surroundings: End of the holidays: The first rescuers pack up
description: In Brüel endet mit dem neuen Schuljahr die Bewachung der Badeanstalt: In Sternberg und Warin bleiben die Rettungsschwimmer.
summarization: Und damit packen die Rettungsschwimmer bereits an den ersten Badestellen ihre Sachen. Denn so ist es in Verträ...

title: Saudi coalition wobbles as separatists take over Yemen's Aden
titleEn: Saudi coalition wobbles as separatists take over Yemen's Aden
description: The southern separatists' takeover of Aden, the interim seat of Yemen's government, could leave Saudi Arabia struggling to hold together a mili
summarization: The two sides had been nominally allied in the coalition fighting the Houthis, who ousted Hadi's government from the capital Sanaa in 2014, but they have rival agendas. The Western-backed Sunni Muslim coalition intervened in Yemen against the Houthis in 2015.

title: Jemen-Krieg wird für Saudi-Arabien zum Desaster
titleEn: Yemen war is a disaster for Saudi Arabia
description: Die Emirate ziehen ab, zwischen Regierung und Separatisten kommt es zum offenen Bruch: Im Bürgerkrieg im Jemen zeigen sich Risse im von Saudi-Arabien angeführten Bündnis. Im Jemen tobt nun ein Bürgerkrieg im Bürgerkrieg.
summarization: Zubaidis „Übergangsrat des Südens“ wird von den Vereinigten Arabischen Emiraten (VAE unterstützt – einem bisher treuen Verbündeten der Saudis. Schon vor Zubaidis Attacke hatten die VAE den Rückzug ihrer Truppen aus dem Jemen verkündet.

title: Die saudische Allianz im Jemenkrieg zerfällt
titleEn: The Saudi alliance in the Yemen War is falling apart
description: Kronprinz bin Salman führt ein Bündnis im Jemenkrieg an - nun wendet sich mit den Vereinigten Emiraten ein wichtiger Partner ab. Was wird Saudi-Arabien tun?
summarization: Die Wende der VAE verwirrt den Partner Saudi-Arabien und dessen Helfer im Jemen. Die von der Golfmonarchie gestützte offizielle Regierung des Landes warf Zubaidi und den Emiraten gar einen Putschversuch vor.

title: ASX to open flat, US yields fall
description: A drop in US Treasury yields pressured bank shares on Wall Street, checking optimism about trade talks between the US and China.
summarization: Europe European shares rose comfortably on Tuesday led by Italian stocks on hopes of an arrangement to form a new coalition government in Rome, while Beijing's pledge to boost car sales triggered gains in auto-makers exposed to Chinese markets. Advertisement Stocks in Hong Kong ended slightly lower on Tuesday as the Chinese-ruled city's biggest political crisis in decades dented sentiment and offset renewed hopes of a Sino-US trade deal.

title: Miley Cyrus gets tattoo to commemorate her Italian vacation with Kaitlynn Carter
titleEn: Miley Cyrus gets tattoo to commemorate her Italian vacation with Kaitlynn Carter
description: Miley Cyrus has commemorated her recent getaway with Kaitlynn Jenner by getting a tattoo.
summarization: The pair were spotted getting close on a yacht in Lake Como during a girls' getaway, just days before Miley revealed she had split from her husband of seven months. And while sources close to the singer claim that she "wants to start a relationship" with the blonde, Kaitlynn's ex, Brody Jenner, seemingly confirmed the stars are already together.

title: Magazine publishes image of wrong model in Adut Akech feature
titleEn: Magazine publishes image of wrong model in Adut Akech feature
description: Who Magazine, an Australian weekly entertainment publication, has mistakenly published the image of a different black model, Flavia Lazarus, in its Adut Akech article.
summarization: Australian supermodel Adut Akech poses for photos at the Melbourne City Baths after it was announced Akech would be the Melbourne Fashion Week 2022 ambassador. Melbourne Fashion Week apologized for the mistake in a post on Instagram, writing: "Last week an article was published in Who Magazine profiling our ambassador Adut Akech.

title: 'Abandoned' angel and Christ discovered beneath masterpiece
titleEn: 'Abandoned' angel and Christ discovered beneath masterpiece
description: Experts have used sophisticated imaging technology to reveal hidden drawings of an angel and Christ beneath a Leonardo da Vinci masterpiece.
summarization: Experts have used sophisticated imaging technology to reveal hidden drawings of an angel and Christ beneath a Leonardo da Vinci masterpiece. “The Virgin of the Rocks,” located at the National Gallery in London, revealed its secrets thanks to macro X-ray fluorescence technology that identified zinc in the drawings.

title: TLIT.MI - Telecom Italia SpA Profile
titleEn: TLIT.MI - Telecom Italia SpA Profile
summarization: The Company focuses on various areas of digital services, including Enriched Communication, Trusted Digital Life, Business Life, Indoor Life, Mobile Open Life and Digital Entertainment. Smart Green is the assessment of projects connected with the environment and potential partnerships with the local government offices for the monitoring of air in public offices and urban areas, using networks of sensors connected to the Company's Cloud.

title: 1913.HK - Prada S.p.A. Profile
titleEn: 1913.HK - Prada S.p.A. Profile
summarization: Prada SpA operates in approximately 70 countries through directly operated stores, franchise operated stores, a network of selected multi-brand stores and department stores. Prada Spa operates through a numerous subsidiaries, including Artisans Shoes Srl, Angelo Marchesi Srl, Prada Far East BV, Tannerie Megisserie Hervy SAS and Prada SA, among others.

title: Brazil World Cup winner Cafu's son dies after playing football
titleEn: Brazil World Cup winner Cafu's son dies after playing football
description: The son of the former Brazil captain and two-time World Cup winner Cafu has died of a suspected heart attack at the age of 30 while playing football near his family home in Sao Paolo.

title: Liverpool's European kings honored in FIFPro World XI shortlist
titleEn: Liverpool's European kings honored in FIFPro World XI shortlist
description: After lifting a sixth European title last season, and enthralling fans with swashbuckling football, Jurgen Klopp's Liverpool side has provided seven players on the 55-man FIFPro World XI shortlist.

title: MDBI.MI - Mediobanca Group Profile
titleEn: MDBI.MI - Mediobanca Group Profile
summarization: Together with its subsidiaries, the Company's activities are divided into three main segments: Corporate and Investment Banking (CIB, Consumer Banking and Wealth Management. The Consumer Banking segment includes personal loans, credit cards and salary-backed finance.

titleEn: EZJ.L - easyJet plc Profile
summarization: The Company operates as a low-cost European point-to-point short-haul airline. The Company operates on over 820 routes across more than 30 countries with its fleet of over 250 Airbus aircrafts.

titleEn: VIV.PA - Vivendi SA Profile
summarization: It operates businesses throughout the media value chain, from talent discovery to the creation, production and distribution of content. Its Universal Music Group segment is engaged in the sale of recorded music, exploitation of music publishing rights, as well as artist services and merchandising.

title: Ponte Morandi un anno dopo, a Genova la commemorazione delle vittime
titleEn: Ponte Morandi a year later, in Genoa the commemoration of the victims
description: Genova e tutta la nazione ricordano le vittime del crollo del ponte Morandi di Genova, tra cui la dolorosa perdita dei due lavoratori albanesi, Admir Bokrina e Marius Djerri
summarization: Anche due albanesi vittime del crollo del ponte Morandi a Genova. l nostro pensiero va alle famiglie delle vittime, fra le quali le famiglie di Admir e Marius.

title: Napoli pronto a dire sì
titleEn: Naples ready to say yes
description: Leggi su Sky Sport l'articolo Hysaj al Valencia: Napoli pronto a dire sì
summarization: Trattativa che si è accesa nelle ultime ore, soprattutto dopo il grave infortunio di Cristiano Piccini, che in allenamento si è fratturato la rotula e potrebbe restare fuori per gran parte della stagione. Hysaj, capitano dell’Albania, fu portato al Napoli nel 2015 da Maurizio Sarri, che lo aveva allenato anche all’Empoli: 171 le presenze totali in azzurro.

title: Italia, 26 convocati per Armenia e Finlandia
titleEn: Italy, 26 called for Armenia and Finland
description: EURO 2020, I 26 CONVOCATI DI MANCINI PER ARMENIA-ITALIA E FINLANDIA-ITALIA
summarization: Riparte con un doppio impegno in trasferta la corsa della Nazionale verso Euro 2020: per la quinta e sesta giornata delle qualificazioni gli Azzurri affrontano le due sorprese del girone J, l'Armenia (giovedì 5 settembre, ore 18 - Stadio 'Vazgen Sargysan' di Yerevan e la Finlandia (domenica 8 settembre, ore 20.45 - 'Tampere Stadion' di Tampere, che attualmente sono le più dirette inseguitrici dell'Italia capolista avendo scavalcato Grecia e Bosnia Erzegovina, le rivali più temute all'inizio delle qualificazioni. Da quella sconfitta allo 'Stade de France', per gli Azzurri nelle qualificazioni europee 34 gare utili (serie aperta con 28 vittorie, le ultime 8 di fila, e 6 pareggi.

title: Kalinic and Mkhitaryan for Roma
titleEn: Kalinic and Mkhitaryan for Roma
description: Nikola Kalinic has arrived for his Roma medical, on loan from Atletico Madrid with option to buy, while Arsenalâs Henrikh Mkhitaryan is also in talks.  	Kalinic had already agreed personal terms several days ago and was just waiting for Patrik Schick to make his move to RB Leipzig.
summarization: Kalinic had already agreed personal terms several days ago and was just waiting for Patrik Schick to make his move to RB Leipzig. The former Fiorentina and Milan striker landed at Fiumicino Airport in Rome late this evening and will have his Roma medical tomorrow morning at the Villa Stuart clinic.

title: Mkhitaryan flies out for Roma
titleEn: Mkhitaryan flies out for Roma
description: Henrikh Mkhitaryan is en route to Italy and will have his medical ahead of a loan move from Arsenal to Roma.  	Roma Radio confirmed the news and he is due to land at Fiumicino Airport at 10.55 local time, 09.55 in the UK.  	Itâs reported to be a loan deal with option to buy at the end of the season.

Milan centre-back Romagnoli already played with Leonardo Bonucci for a year at Milan, so is the natural choice to step in for Chiellini.

title: Rapiscono una donna in pieno centro a Torino, fermati tre tedeschi
titleEn: They kidnap a woman in the center of Turin, arrest three Germans

La Polizia di Torino è intervenuta dopo aver ricevuto la segnalazione che in pieno centro attorno alle 10.15 una donna è …
summarization: La Polizia di Torino è intervenuta dopo aver ricevuto la segnalazione che in pieno centro attorno alle 10.15 una donna è stata fatta salire a forza su di un furgone nero. I tre uomini a bordo, con giubotti antiproiettili, sono stati fermati e la donna, incolume, liberata.

title: La fabbrica mondiale delle notizie false si trova in Macedonia
titleEn: The world factory of false news is in Macedonia

summarization: Uno degli insegnanti, Mirko Ceselkoski, ha spiegato alla Cnn che nella cittadina c'è una grande comunità di giovani che non hanno niente da fare. Per contrastare questi meccanismi perversi, Google e Facebook hanno messo a punto delle soluzioni per smascherare i falsi siti e gli account immaginari.

title: Kosovo, bloccate le importazioni di patate e miele dalla Macedonia del Nord
titleEn: Kosovo, blocked imports of potatoes and honey from Northern Macedonia
description: La misura adottata dalle autorità kosovare arriva come conseguenza agli ostacoli tariffari imposti dalla Macedonia del Nord sulle importazioni di pesce provenienti dal Kosovo.
summarization: Le autorità kosovare hanno preso un provvedimento riguardante due prodotti alimentari nei confronti della Macedonia del Nord: per proteggere gli interessi delle imprese e la produzione nazionale, infatti, il Kosovo ha bloccato le importazioni di patate e miele naturale. Il ministro dell’agricoltura, Trajan Dimovski, ha dichiarato che lo stop delle importazioni di miele naturale e pesce non è un divieto speciale solo per il Kosovo.

title: Macedonia del Nord, nei guai la pm voluta da Mogherini e Juncker
titleEn: Northern Macedonia, in trouble the pm wanted by Mogherini and Juncker
description: È nei guai il super procuratore indicato da Federica Mogherini e Jean-Claude Juncker nella Macedonia del Nord per far fronte alla corruzione
summarization: Secondo Joveski, le prove dimostrerebbero che il Procuratore speciale avrebbe ottenuto vantaggi personali quantificabili in 290 mila dinari macedoni (4.700 euro per usare la sua influenza a beneficio di uno dei sospettati nel caso Racket. Il Procuratore speciale macedone per la vicenda intercettazioni telefoniche era stata ascoltata l’altro ieri dalla Procura e aveva auspicato che la sua testimonianza potesse aiutare il lavoro della Procura per fare chiarezza sul caso “Racket”.

title: Albania, oltre 3,3 milioni di stranieri nei primi 7 mesi dell’anno. Anche ad agosto boom di turisti
titleEn: Albania, over 3.3 million foreigners in the first 7 months of the year. Also in August boom of tourists
description: Continua l'aumento di turisti in Albania: il 20 di agosto più 16,4% rispetto al 2018. Klosi: "Speriamo di arrivare a 10 milioni entro i primi anni del nuovo decennio"
summarization: Circa 1,2 milioni di turisti stranieri hanno visitato l’Albania nel mese di luglio 2019, facendo registrare una crescita del 14,5% rispetto a luglio 2018. Se, invece, si considerano i primi sette mesi del 2019, il numero di turisti sale a circa 3,3 milioni facendo registrare una crescita del 12,4% rispetto al 2018.

title: Paul Pogba limps away from Man Utd's draw with Southampton with ankle injury
titleEn: Paul Pogba limps away from Man Utd's draw with Southampton with ankle injury
description: PAUL POGBA capped a disparate display at Southampton by picking up an ankle injury. As the Manchester United midfielder left St Mary’s on Saturday he was evidently limping with a problem in h…
summarization: Fortunately, or not as the case may be, Pogba has a couple of weeks off before potentially missing any United games. After that, United take on Leicester and Astana with six games in 19 days when club football resumes.

title: Nicolas Edet takes race lead as Arndt wins stage eight
titleEn: Nicolas Edet takes race lead as Arndt wins stage eight
description: Frenchman Nicolas Edet became the new overall leader in the Vuelta a España as German rider Nikias Arndt sprinted to victory
summarization: Frenchman Nicolas Edet became the new overall leader in the Vuelta a España on Saturday as German rider Nikias Arndt sprinted to victory on stage eight in the province of Barcelona. “It’s one of the best days in my career so far.”

title: Man Utd boss Solskjaer sends seven-word transfer message to Real Madrid over Paul Pogba

description: MANCHESTER UNITED boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is adamant that Paul Pogba won’t be leaving Old Trafford despite Real Madrid’s interest.
summarization: Paul Pogba will be playing for us Manchester United boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer The Norwegian gaffer hopes it is nothing serious and that he will be able to play for France in the Euro qualifiers against Albania and Andorra. Solskjaer admitted that United put together a sloppy performance but pointed out that the France international was a major creative force in the last half hour of the game.

title: Quintana takes lead as Pogacar wins storm-affected stage nine
titleEn: Quintana takes lead as Pogacar wins storm-affected stage nine
description: Tadej Pogacar won stage nine of the Vuelta a España as Colombian climber Nairo Quintana claimed the red jersey
summarization: UAE Team Emirates rider Pogacar battled through heavy rain and lightning storms to power to victory on the gruelling 94.4-kilometres route from Andorra La Vella to the summit of Cortals d’Encamp. The 20-year-old Slovenian finished 23 seconds ahead of new race leader Quintana, with compatriot Primoz Roglic third, Alejandro Valverde fourth and Marc Soler fifth.

title: Matteo Guendouzi handed first France call-up as replacement for Paul Pogba

summarization: The Manchester United star has withdrawn from Les Bleus' squad for their upcoming matches. The all-action Arsenal midfielder was outstanding in their 2-2 draw with Tottenham on Sunday.

titleEn: Arsenal midfielder Matteo Guendouzi backed to blossom into ‘superstar’ on three conditions

summarization: “I said last season that Matteo Guendouzi can go on and be whatever he wants to be in the Premier League,” Collymore told The Mirror . “He has the ability, the vision and the awareness.

title: The three stars Unai Emery must tell Arsenal transfer chiefs to scout during international
titleEn: The three stars Unai Emery must tell Arsenal transfer chiefs to scout during international
description: Arsenal spent more than any other Premier League club during the summer but, as Unai Emery looks to assemble a side which can challenge for the title, which players should be scouted during the international break?
summarization: The Bournemouth winger’s contract expires in the summer and he is reportedly no closer to signing an extension . The 25-year-old was flattered by Arsenal interest last season and would relish a move to a top-six club.

The Albanians lined up to sing their national song at the Parc des Princes ahead of their Euro qualification clash with the reigning world champions France.

title: Barcelona star reveals all on being included in Neymar swap deal with PSG
titleEn: Barcelona star reveals all on being included in Neymar swap deal with PSG

summarization: Brazil team news: Predicted vs Peru – Neymar hunts Ronaldo record But Frenchman Umtiti, who has struggled with playing time in Catalonia, has laughed off those claims. It made me laugh, I don’t even have an answer to where it comes from,” he told Canal Football Club.

title: Iranian rocket launch pad explosion caught on satellite photo
titleEn: Iranian rocket launch pad explosion caught on satellite photo
description: The incident, Iran's third failed launch this year, took place at the Imam Khomeini Space Centre in Iran's Semnan province, and was captured on satellite image.
summarization: In previous days, satellite images had shown officials there repainted the launch pad blue. An Iranian official later told Reuters the explosion" was due to some technical issues...but our young scientists are working to fix the problem."

title: Hackers find way to infect iPhones with spyware using tainted websites
titleEn: Hackers find way to infect iPhones with spyware using tainted websites
description: Researchers say suspected nation-state hackers infected Apple iPhones with spyware capable of sending the smartphone owner's text messages, email, photos and real-time location data to the cyber spies.
summarization: Researchers say suspected nation-state hackers infected Apple iPhones with spyware over two years in what security experts have called an alarming security failure. A mere visit to one of a small number of tainted websites could infect an iPhone with an implant capable of sending the smartphone owner's text messages, email, photos and real-time location data to the cyber spies behind the operation.

title: Hackers find way to infect iPhones with spyware using tainted websites
titleEn: Hackers find way to infect iPhones with spyware using tainted websites
description: Researchers say suspected nation-state hackers infected Apple iPhones with spyware capable of sending the smartphone owner's text messages, email, photos and real-time location data to the cyber spies.

title: Arsenal come back to draw with Spurs, Everton edge out Wolves
titleEn: Arsenal come back to draw with Spurs, Everton edge out Wolves
description: Arsenal came back from two goals down against Tottenham Hotspur to draw 2-2, while Everton secured a thrilling a 3-2 win over Wolves.
summarization: Earlier on Sunday, Richarlison scored twice to help Everton beat Wolverhampton Wanderers 3-2. Arsenal has came back from two goals down against Tottenham Hotspur to draw 2-2 in the Premier League on Sunday, with the Gunners' much-anticipated attacking trio unable to see off their fierce north London rivals.

title: The world's most profitable company has just replaced its chairman
titleEn: The world's most profitable company has just replaced its chairman
description: Oil giant Saudi Aramco has just replaced its chairman as it ramps up preparations to go public.
summarization: Khalid Al-Falih, Saudi Arabia's energy and industry minister, has been replaced as chairman of Saudi Aramco. Falih later congratulated Rumayyan on the appointment on his official twitter feed, saying that it was "an important step to prepare the company for the public offering."

title: Revamped Socceroos ready for Kuwait test
titleEn: Revamped Socceroos ready for Kuwait test
description: Socceroos coach Graham Arnold says Australia's upcoming World Cup qualifier against Kuwait shapes as an opportunity to test out a fresh group of players.
summarization: Socceroos coach Graham Arnold says Australia's upcoming World Cup qualifier against Kuwait shapes as an opportunity to test out a fresh group of players. The Socceroos are currently training in the United Arab Emirates as they prepare for the opening game of their qualifying campaign for Qatar 2022.

title: 'Not just for men' as 10,000 women ride across the world
titleEn: 'Not just for men' as 10,000 women ride across the world
description: A pilgrimage of female motorbike riders, in what may be the largest recorded relay ever, arrives in Sydney with more than 50 countries on their passports.
summarization: "After that, I will go to America and then 19 countries in South America. Carried along with the group, a baton has so far made it to more than 50 countries, in the hope of encouraging women to take part in motorsports.

title: Kuwait send Socceroos a World Cup qualifying warning
titleEn: Kuwait send Socceroos a World Cup qualifying warning
description: The Socceroos will be facing a confident Kuwait on Wednesday (AEST after the gulf nation hammered Nepal 7-0.
summarization: Baha Faisal and Ahmed Samir gave Vital Bourkelmans' side a two-goal lead at half-time before Wen Chih-hao claimed a late consolation. Taipei: The Socceroos will be facing a confident Kuwait on Wednesday (AEST after the gulf nation hammered Nepal 7-0 on the opening night of Asia's second qualifying round for the 2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar.

title: Airlines have no easy answers for flight-shaming critics
titleEn: Airlines have no easy answers for flight-shaming critics
description: Airlines are scrambling to defend themselves against a rising tide of criticism over aircraft carbon emissions which is starting to affect demand.
summarization: They also objected to punitive measures they maintain would be counter-productive or unintentionally hurt those who couldn't afford additional costs. Airline bosses have sought to defend their business against a rising tide of criticism over aircraft emissions as an upswell of activism threatens to overwhelm the industry before it can mount an effective response.

title: Gerald Ridsdale's decades-long trail of destruction

1961-63

summarization: Che cosa rappresenta per gli imprenditori italiani il Private Office of Sheikh Saeed Bin Ahmed Al Maktoum Italy? Ma che cosa fa esattamente il Private Office of Sheikh Saeed Bin Ahmed Al Maktoum Italy per facilitare l’ingresso e lo sviluppo di aziende straniere nel mercato degli Emirati Arabi Uniti?

title: Prosegue il traffico dei falchi che negli Emirati è uno status symbol
titleEn: The hawks traffic continues, which in the Emirates is a status symbol
description: In Kuwait prosegue il traffico dei falchi nonostante sia proibito. Infatti, il paese del Golfo Persico ha siglato una convenzione internazionale per la...
summarization: Infatti, il paese del Golfo Persico ha siglato una convenzione internazionale per la protezione dei rapaci, contro il commercio delle specie. Ma sono in molti a non curarsene, specie fra i venditori che commerciano questi rapaci selvaggi anche con la famiglia reale del Kuwait.

title: Il "Piano del secolo" di Trump per il Medio Oriente si sfarina, Greenblatt esce di scena
titleEn: Trump's "Plan of the Century" for the Middle East crumbles, Greenblatt leaves the scene
description: Netanyahu perde uno dei suoi più convinti sostenitori nell’amministrazione Trump. Ashrawi: "Nessuno lo rimpiangerà"
summarization: Non c’è scelta pro-israeliana compiuta da The Donald che non abbia visto in Greenblatt uno dei più tenaci assertori: dagli insediamenti allo spostamento dell’ambasciata Usa da Tel Aviv a Gerusalemme. Una pace giusta che contempli uno Stato palestinese indipendente con Gerusalemme Est sua capitale, non è un mercimonio.

title: Pronto al lancio il primo cosmonauta degli Emirati Arabi
titleEn: The first cosmonaut of the United Arab Emirates is ready to launch
description: Mosca, 6 set. (askanews – È di nuovo tempo di lanci spaziali in Russia e, come di consueto, si ripetono i rituali che precedono la partenza di una navetta Soyuz alla volta della Stazione spaziale internazionale come la deposizione delle rose sulle tombe di Yuri Gagarin, primo uomo nello Spazio e Sergei Korolev, padre della …
summarization: (askanews – È di nuovo tempo di lanci spaziali in Russia e, come di consueto, si ripetono i rituali che precedono la partenza di una navetta Soyuz alla volta della Stazione spaziale internazionale come la deposizione delle rose sulle tombe di Yuri Gagarin, primo uomo nello Spazio e Sergei Korolev, padre della cosmonautica russa. Ad accoglierlo sull’Iss, anche l’astronauta italiano dell’Esa e colonnello pilota sperimentatore dell’Aeronautica militare, Luca Parmitano che proprio ad ottobre prenderà il comando della base orbitante.
